DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate retina adapts different metabolic challenge , e.g . chronic systemic hypoxia , hyperglycemia , special training condition diet well transient change content oxygen glucose blood .
DOC.brief_title: Retinal Function Relation Transient Chronic Challenges Retinal Metabolism
DOC.criteria: Healthy individual Healthy volunteer . No known systemic ocular disease . Any systemic ocular disease . Patients diabetes Inclusion criterion : Diabetes mellitus No intraocular disease condition attributable diabetes . Exclusion criterion : Intraocular disease condition attributable diabetes . Systemic condition might contraindicate hyperoxic stimulation .
